meta.title: Hello, I'm Iliya Glazunov
meta.description: I am a passionate Python developer seeking my first professional opportunity. With over 5 years of non-commercial experience, I have gained strong skills in web application development and creating Telegram bots. I am also familiar with blockchain and natural language processing.
meta.keywords: portfolio, frontend, Python, Telegram bots, NLP, blockchain, developer, business card

home.title: Hello, I'm Iliya Glazunov
home.description:
I am a passionate Python developer seeking my first professional opportunity. With over 5 years of non-commercial experience, I have gained strong skills in web application development and creating Telegram bots. I am also familiar with blockchain and natural language processing.

My goal is to create user-friendly and effective solutions to help users achieve their goals. I am committed to continuing to learn and develop to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends.
